attributes.action: Help for working families as we’re struggling too with the cost of living
attributes.additional_details:
Look at the working class people/families and give them a little help too

Families losing houses as can’t no longer afford their mortgage

Families can’t heat their homes cause wages have to buy food for their family

Not asking for alot but some kind of help, food banks are struggling to keep up demand as people are finding it really hard not n this current climate
attributes.background:
The Government need to take a hard look at the way the system is working right now as hard working people/families are struggling to pay bills due to the costs of living crisis, it’s not just those on benefits.
Families are struggling to keep homes warm with the price of gas and electricity

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the cost of living, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Pass a law to stop standing charges on domestic bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644887

Permanently scrap green levies on energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640214

Uprate benefits in line with CPI inflation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644655

If you'd like the Government to do something else you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
